description: A humorous take on a silly question.
title: Foot Logic
n_1: Sam and Alex are sitting on a bench in the park.
c1_1: Hey Alex, is there a hole in your shoe?
n_2: Sam smirks and raises an eyebrow.
c1_2: Then how'd you get your foot in it?
n_3: Alex shakes her head and laughs.
c1_3: You walked right into that one!
